disease: Malignant melanoma of right ear and external auricular canal

physical_findings: Bluish-black mass in the external auditory canal (EAC)
No other significant findings in the right ear or head and neck
Left sided parotid and preauricular lymph node swellings (after 5 months)

required: Histopathological examination showing ulceroproliferative growth of medium to large pigmented cells with prominent nucleoli
Tumor cell infiltration into deeper subcutaneous tissue, parotid gland, and intraparotid lymph nodes
Evidence of vascular and perineural invasion
supportive: Clinical presentation of a pigmented lesion
